introduction: SYNOPSISWhen their daughter Yon-ha is arrested for adultery, Professor Kim and his wife are shocked. Professor Kim collapses from high blood pressure. Their daughter was brought up by Puritan values. In the divorce court, the events leading up to her arrest are revealed one after another The court sympathizes with Yon-ha for not being able to bear her husband's debauchery any longer. Also, they believe the husband beat her. In the end, the court finds Yon-ha innocent of the charges. The repentant husband begs her to come back to him but Yon-ha rejects him coldly.故事涉嫌通奸doeja金Gyosu夫妇的小女儿越来越震惊金教授落在血压。她接受了通奸被抓了清教徒的培训活动将开始显露审判过程。这不再认出了她丈夫的心脏和突击吞咽无法忍受丈夫的放纵承诺收到吞咽无罪释放。一个遗憾的丈夫恳求回来吞咽吞咽平静地拒绝了。
